title: Macaroni Salad
ingredients: 2 cups dry elbow macaroni, cooked, rinsed and drained
1/4 cup minced onion, soaked in cold water for 5 min, drained
1/2 tsp kosher salt, plus more to taste
instructions: In a large bowl combine macaroni, celery, onion, parsley, tomato (if using).
In a small bowl, whisk together mayonnaise, mustard, sugar, vinegar, sour cream, and salt.
Pour the dressing over the salad and salt and pepper to taste.
Stir to combine. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve. Store covered in the refrigerator for up to 3 days.
